decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping into powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells. It aims to pressure the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer while also utilizing cards like Drowner of Hope and Elder Deep-Fiend to control the board and tempo of the game. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Ugin, the Ineffable to provide additional threats and control options. The mana base is designed to support the Eldrazi creatures' color requirements while also providing flexibility with fetch lands.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers to dominate the board. It also makes use of snow lands and snow permanents to maximize the value of cards like Ice-Fang Coatl and Arcum's Astrolabe. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage and eventually winning the game through incremental advantage and superior resource management.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent with low-cost, efficient spells like Bump in the Night, Lava Spike, and Lightning Bolt, while also utilizing aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear. The deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero before they have a chance to stabilize or mount a defense. The mana base is designed to provide the necessary colors and flexibility for casting spells efficiently.

The deck focuses on generating incremental advantage and controlling the game through various artifacts, including Sword of the Meek and Thopter Foundry. It leverages powerful disruptive spells like Cryptic Command and Engineered Explosives, along with efficient card draw and filtering with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Arcum's Astrolabe. The deck also has a strong mana ramp package with cards like Mox Opal and Gilded Goose to quickly get to its powerful threats like Urza, Lord High Artificer and Oko, Thief of Crowns, while also utilizing Emry, Lurker of the Loch for recursion and additional value.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards by utilizing cards like Hedron Crab, Stitcher's Supplier, and Glimpse the Unthinkable. This enables you to trigger powerful effects such as Prized Amalgam and Vengevine to swarm the board and overwhelm your opponent. Additionally, cards like Gravecrawler and Carrion Feeder provide a recursive engine to keep applying pressure and maintaining board presence. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and quickly end the game with a flurry of aggressive creatures and spells from the graveyard.

The key focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their game plan with cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Chalice of the Void. By utilizing lands like Eldrazi Temple and Urza's lands, this deck can quickly ramp into its big threats. It also has removal options like Dismember and Blast Zone to deal with opposing threats. The goal is to establish board presence early and maintain pressure throughout the game, making it difficult for the opponent to stabilize and mount a comeback.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Death's Shadow creature as a powerful threat, while also making use of spells like Stubborn Denial and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to be aggressive in nature, using cards like Temur Battle Rage to quickly close out games. The inclusion of efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember helps the deck to control the board while also fueling the graveyard for cards like Gurmag Angler and Tasigur, the Golden Fang. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and proactive in nature.

The main concept of this deck is to exert aggressive pressure on the opponent with low-cost, efficient creatures and burn spells. By utilizing repeatable sources of damage such as Eidolon of the Great Revel and Monastery Swiftspear, along with direct damage spells like Lava Spike and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total before they can stabilize. The inclusion of versatile cards like Boros Charm and Skullcrack provide additional reach and flexibility in dealing with opposing threats or gaining an edge in the race to victory.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures while disrupting their game plan with hand disruption and removal spells. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and Wrenn and Six to control the board and generate value. Tarmogoyf and Bloodbraid Elf provide strong threats that can close out the game quickly. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push to deal with threats efficiently. Overall, the deck seeks to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game through a combination of aggression and disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the dredge mechanic to fill the graveyard with key cards like Bloodghast, Prized Amalgam, and Narcomoeba, then use cards like Life from the Loam to continually bring them back to the battlefield. The deck focuses on self-mill strategies, with cards like Stinkweed Imp and Cathartic Reunion helping to fill the graveyard quickly. By continually bringing back creatures and triggering effects like Creeping Chill, the deck can overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats and life drain.

This deck focuses on using Death's Shadow as a powerful threat to quickly close out games. The deck includes cards like Street Wraith and Mishra's Bauble to lower your life total, while cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize disrupt your opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Tidehollow Sculler help control the board and provide additional value. By utilizing a low life total to power up Death's Shadow and combining it with efficient removal spells, this deck aims to apply pressure early and force opponents to react defensively.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible using efficient red spells and creatures. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear to apply pressure early on, while also utilizing burn spells like Lava Spike, Rift Bolt, and Lightning Bolt to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel and Searing Blaze to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized for consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's spells.

The main idea behind this Dredge combo deck is to fill your graveyard with cards like Narcomoeba, Prized Amalgam, and Vengevine, while also utilizing cards like Creeping Chill and Glimpse the Unthinkable to deal damage to your opponent. By using cards like Hedron Crab and Stitcher's Supplier to mill cards into your graveyard, you can quickly assemble your combo pieces and overwhelm your opponent with an army of creatures. The deck also includes some self-discard effects like Carrion Feeder and Gurmag Angler to further fuel your graveyard strategy.

The deck focuses on using artifacts to control the game and generate value, with a particular emphasis on the combo of Thopter Foundry and Sword of the Meek. It also utilizes cards like Urza, Lord High Artificer and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to generate mana and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy through cards like Damping Sphere and Ensnaring Bridge, while also being able to tutor for key pieces with Whir of Invention. Overall, the deck aims to grind out advantages and control the game through its artifact synergies.

The main concept of this deck is to use aggressive creatures like Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler to quickly reduce your own life total, making these creatures stronger, while also disrupting your opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Stubborn Denial. By using cards like Snapcaster Mage to recur important spells and Temur Battle Rage to give your creatures trample and double strike, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm your opponent and secure a fast victory. The deck also includes cantrips like Serum Visions and Mishra's Bauble to keep the engine running smoothly.

This aggressive red deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through efficient creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear alongside spells like Lava Spike and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure to the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel and Skullcrack helps to disrupt the opponent's game plan and prevent them from gaining life or stabilizing. Overall, the deck prioritizes aggression and direct damage to overwhelm the opponent and secure victories.
